statements: DELETE FROM loans WHERE borrower_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM loans WHERE borrower_name = 'Alice' AND loan_term < 5 AND loan_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM lenders WHERE lender_name = 'John Doe';
